document.full_text: deep-sea searchers picking through wreckage of an air france plane that crashed off brazil in 2009 have found a part that held one of the flight's data recorders, but without the memory unit that could provide crucial clues to the crash.
document.title: searchers find part of air france black box off brazil
lines_and_colors: deep-sea searchers picking through wreckage of an air france plane that crashed off brazil in 2009 have found a part that held one of the flight's data recorders, but without the memory unit that could provide crucial clues to the crash.
